name: I Hate My Job!
description:
"You've been fired! You've been fired!"

After your boss fires you for stupid reasons, you decide to come back in full force with one hammer and zero clothes. Let's stick it up to those corporate wet blankets!

Credits:

Taken from OpenGameArt.com:

-Player sprites and animation by user TheraHedwig

-Lawyer sprites and animation by user gustavoasilveira

-Desk sprites made using art by user FuzzyWuzzie

-Wood breaking sound by user qubodup

-Song made using Tactical Pursuit by user Matthew Pablo

-Hammer sprite by user laxattack1226

Taken from orangefreesounds.com:

-Glass breaking sound by user Alexander

Animation for things breaking, logo, buttons, floor sprites and choirs made by myself, all programming as well.

Criteria:

1-Endless Runner: this seems like an awfully long office space.

2-Fantasy: I sure hope your actual reaction to being fired from a real company wouldn't be this one ;)

3-Devil may care: As long as lawyers don't catch us we should be okay, breaking stuff is fun!

4-Epic Music: Intense beat, beautiful thematic choirs, what could make your wrecking experience more epic than this?
